long_description: The triple-layered, dual-flavored, soft and chewy Pure Organic Fruit Sandwich bar creates a creamy and rich taste that melts in your mouth. It's the perfect way to add a little Pure to your day. The Pure Organic Fruit Sandwich bar is certified organic, non-GMO verified , gluten-free and vegan. Made from real fruit purees and juices; no artificial sweeteners, flavors, or preservatives. Each bar provides 3/4 serving of fruit. Made in a peanut-free facility.
short_description: The triple-layered, dual-flavored, soft and chewy Pure Organic Fruit Sandwich bar creates a creamy and rich taste that melts in your mouth. It's the perfect way to add a little Pure to your day.
